pages.text: The following blocks are useful on $(l:kinetic_machines/contraptions)Contraptions$().$(br)Other Kinetic Machines, such as the $(l:kinetic_machines/drill)Mechanical Drill$(), may also act as Contraption Actors. See their entries for more information.
Contraption Actors are enabled by default when the contraption is assembled. Use Contraption Controls to disable them.$(br2)$(ponder)
When attached to a moving contraption, Mechanical Harvesters will harvest, store, and re-plant crops.$(br2)$(ponder)
When attached to a moving contraption, Mechanical Plows will break blocks without collision, till dirt, and launch entities.$(br2)$(ponder)
Mechanical Rollers cam be used for paving paths. $(br2)$(ponder)

A pair of Portable Storage Interfaces, one attached to the contraption and one not, will enable the contraption to stop and place its stored items in other containers.$(br)Portable Fluid Interfaces work similarly.$(br)$(ponder)
